div.p: M. Kerschner, L. Asher, N. Kramer, B. Wright, S. Sura, K. Lee, T. Tapscott, and N. Payne assisted in field and lab work. We thank the National Bison Range personnel for permitting this study, and the Center for Environmental Science and Technology for assistance in chemical analyses. Funding was provided by the University of Notre Dame and National Science Foundation (DEB-0415390 and DEB-0918306).
